A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie per se was not bad but it lacked a meaningful plot and character development. I still don't understand why Luke had to die\, he was the only charismatic character left alive (Kylo and Ray are just dumb kids) and the silly way he \"departed\" is preposterous. How the hell Rian Johnson came up with this pile of crap? Just spare us an Episode 9\, I don't even know why I should watch it honestly.
